text: Toasting to the good times? Kendra Wilkinson indulged in some liquid therapy following news she had filed for a divorce from husband Hank Baskett after almost nine years of marriage. The former Girls Next Door star, 32, shared a photo of herself on her Instagram story on Friday, April 6, and captioned it, “ Lol drunk bunny gamer ” with crying - laughing emoji faces. In the photo, she takes a sip from a frosted shot glass while wearing gamer headphones with a video game controller on her chest.
